description: Students required to complete research thesis on selected topic within their area of major interest. Topic to be approved by Head of School. For details consult Head of School. (If enrolling in this course across 2 semesters: Students commencing in sem 1 must enrol in RBUS7991 for both semesters. Students commencing in sem 2 must enrol in RBUS7992 for both semesters. Students enrolling in a single sem must enrol in RBUS7993).
prerequisites: 16 units of level 7 Business School courses + permission from Head of School
